resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
Welcome to your personal Nokia Phone Library
This App will help you find information on the Nokia phone infront of you, only using your camera
This app requires the use of your camera. Please click "allow" on the next page
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
This application recognizes Nokia phones using only your camera. When one or multiple phones are recognized, the app shows you a box around the recognized phone.
